title: Yoru no Hanabira
sinopse:
Consists of a collection of 7 oneshots:

1. Yoru no Hanabira - Host love.

2. Kaika Zenya - Back story on how one of the hosts started.

3. Junjou Escape - Actors in love.

4. Kimi ni Furu Yuki - Art student in love with his sempai.

5. Koi Suru Yajuu

6. Kamu Otoko

7. Haru wo Aisuru Hito

(from B-U)
